item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me I‚Äôm a Brazilian-Canadian senior software engineer who loves the idea of destroying all the gatekeeping that exists around software. I‚Äôm particularly passionate about making very complex systems sound so simple that a person can only think: ‚Äúis that all?‚Äù I majored in computer science at University of Campinas and worked on the debugger for Visual Studio at Microsoft for 6 years. I‚Äôm based in Vancouver. I‚Äôm currently working on NEVERWAY and a game engine as co-founder at Coldblood Inc.
